entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as gloomy, with a sudden shudder when talking about dementors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's best friends at Hogwarts. He reacts to Hagrid's news with concern, his lip twitching.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's best friends at Hogwarts. She asks Hagrid about his experience in Azkaban, showing concern and empathy.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a maximum-security prison for wizards and witches. Hagrid describes it as a place where he felt terrible and like going mad.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a baby dragon that Hagrid won in a game of cards. He mentions Norbert as one of the painful memories from his past.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school for wizards and witches. Hagrid mentions being expelled from Hogwarts, which is a painful memory for him.
